title: Rutgers football sets new date for spring game after COVID pause
body: has tentatively re-scheduled the Scarlet-White spring game for Thursday, May 20.Coach made the announcement Monday  before Tuesday’s first spring practice, which was pushed back about three weeks due to a team  pause. The game was originally set for Saturday, May 1 at SHI Stadium in Piscataway. Rutgers will have 14 spring practices prior to the spring game.No kickoff time for the game has been announced.Rutgers , but it has not yet announced details of its plan. Gov. Phil Murphy’s most-recent executive order on sporting event attendance , which would be about 15,700 fans (the stadium has a capacity of 52,454). Rutgers would also be able to have up to 20% capacity for its indoor suite seating, which would push the number of potential attendees up.Rutgers , university president Jonathan Holloway recently said in an interview with The Daily Targum, the campus newspaper. But ticket demands at the sports that have had fans this spring -- men’s and women’s lacrosse and soccer -- naturally fit under the state and/or Rutgers limits. The spring football game could be a different story, although playing it during the work week could depress potential attendance.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
